definition: to come to power/to hold power/in office
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: Gates' performance during the hearing didn't sway the powers that be.
sentences.chinese: 盖茨当时在听证会上的表现没能改变当政者的看法。

sentences.english: Darius I, when in power, Zoroastrian as the state religion.
sentences.chinese: 大流士一世当政时，琐罗亚斯德教定为国教。

sentences.english: First, justice Japan' s Showa period, Tanaka was the first person to warlords in power.
sentences.chinese: 田中义一是日本昭和时期军阀当政的第一人。

sentences.english: As nazism took hold of Germany, however, he saw nazism for what it was.
sentences.chinese: 但当纳粹党在德国当政后，他看清了纳粹的真面目。

sentences.english: Pericles was in Athens are reaching its peak.
sentences.chinese: 伯里克利当政时期雅典臻于鼎盛。

sentences.english: The blame, he said, lay both in George W.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马说，布什当政时期的美国朝野都应受到指责。

sentences.english: During Colonel Qaddafi’s rule, China had big interests in Libya’s economy.
sentences.chinese: 在卡扎菲当政期间，中国在利比亚有庞大的经济利益。

sentences.english: Neo- conservatism prevailed in the Reagan era.
sentences.chinese: 在雷根当政期间，新保守主义盛行。

sentences.english: China’s rulers say corrupt cadres are the nation’s worst enemy.
sentences.chinese: 中国当政者说，官员贪污腐败是国家最大的毒瘤。

sentences.english: Are you saying that those in power should ignore their daughters' educational needs?
sentences.chinese: 您说当政者应忽视各家女儿的教育需要吗？

sentences.english: The Democrats have been in since the hand-over of power.
sentences.chinese: 自从权力移交后，民主党人一直当政。

sentences.english: During the Clinton years, remember there was a controversy donors?
sentences.chinese: 克林顿当政期间，有个竞价捐款记得吧？

definition: to wield (political etc) power/be in power
to dismiss from office/to ban/to reject
